title: Video: Jamie Isaac – Hollow Words (Live)
body:
It’s been a while since we last checked in with moody London songwriter **Jamie Isaac**, and I’m taking that radio silence as a sign of more material in the works.

This live take of _Hollow Words_, comes accompanied by visuals shot over the course of last year, and just like the track itself are minimal and ever-so-mysterious. Having yet to put out a physical release, surely 2013 is the year that Jamie Isaac moves out of the bedroom and onto the big stage.

excerpt.full: Jamie Isaac reveals a video for a live take of Hollow Words.
